bibl.title: Teaching Medicine in Late Antiquity: Methods, Texts and Contexts.
Form and Content of Instruction in Anglo-Saxon England in the Light of Contemporary Manuscript Evidence. Papers Presented at the International Conference Udine, 6-8 April 2006

series.title: Fédération Internationale des Instituts d'Études Médiévales. Textes et études du Moyen Âge.
